'''Accountant''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This orlan is [Quarno](/quarno/)'s bookkeeper, and rather reluctantly follows him around to whatever business "meetings" he might attend, even if they do involve sitting in a bathhouse all day. He wants nothing but to leave.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/)
|none            = 
|other           = * The accountant cannot be talked to, but while roaming around the bathhouse he'll say things like ''"All this steam can't be good for the ledger"''.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/): He keeps a record of his transactions in [Quarno's Ledger](/quarnosLedger/), which can either be pickpocketed from him (while he's looking at the aquarium) or looted from him.
